name: LowPoly Chess 3D
description:
LowPoly Chess

Features:

  • Local Multiplayer
  • Enforced Rules
  • Save & Load  using FEN Notation
  • Back and forth between moves
  • Multiple camera angles

Planned Features:

  • Drag'n'Drop Game State Creator
  • Replay games with PG-Notation

Update 0.2

  • Fixed a bug where you could not take an attacking Queen or Rook when being on the same row
  • Fixed a bug where you could not move a piece when it was on the same diagonal as your King as well as the same diagonal as an attacking Queen/Rook even though a piece was inbetween them and your King
  • Added version indicator to the main menu
